Our classes

Yoga Flow

Yoga Flow is your one stop shop for dynamism, energy and athleticism.

With carefully crafted sequences of poses and challenges aplenty, expect to energize all the parts of you from head to toes. In Yoga Flow you will get a taste of creative progressions of poses linked together including standing, balances and everything in between.

Boxing

Boxing develops great hand, eye co-ordination, balance and strengthen; and tones your whole body.

Boxing conditioning not only works all parts of the body but also all aspects of fitness such as; cardiovascular fitness, muscular endurance, muscular strength, stamina, co-ordination, and power.

Zumba

Latin and international music are fused to create an explosive booty shaking, calories burning fitness dance party

Zumba is a total workout, combining all elements of fitness. Cardio, muscle conditioning, balance and flexibility, boosted energy and a serious dose of awesome each time you leave class.
